channel.title: Commands Help... Please
channel.description:
Ok so i've downloaded Glouphrie's Pk ( Server + Client )
And i modded it so im an owner..
But i cant seem to work out the commands...
::item X X.. = DUSNT WORK ::pickup 009955 X = WORKS ::home = WORKS.
They are the only ones that i kno of... is it just because this server has no commands at all..?
If so what client + server shuld i download...
Thanks For Ur Time,
Kory

item.title: Commands Help... Please
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

you could search for a command you know already like help by doing CTRL+F and then typing “help” etc.

item.dc:creator: @AFLjunkie AFLjunkie
item.description:
@AFLjunkie wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:231251"]Search for;

public void customCommand(String command)

All your commands are in there.[/quote]
THANX

Havent tried but gunna try now =]

Read full topic

item.title: Commands Help... Please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Add your own commands?

::xteleto (PlayerName)
::xteletome (PlayerName)
::starter
::eat (PlayerName)
::unban (PlayerName)
::ref
::pnpc (ID)
::sweet
::mypk
::makemem (PlayerName)
::suggest (Suggestion)
::master
::pure
::banuser (PlayerName)
::ipban (PlayerName)
::pickup (ID) (Amount)

There’s MANY more, go into your client.java to find them.
You could also create some yourself.

For example:

}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“santa”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(1050, 1);
sendMessage(“Free Santa!”);
}

That was just a quick thing I made up, and it is MOD+ (> 1)

Read full topic
